careerObjective.shortTerm: Enhance programming skills with a strong focus on RESTful API design and system architecture. Consistently deliver assigned responsibilities while expanding technical expertise and contributing effectively to the current company’s growth.
careerObjective.longTerm: Become a well-rounded professional software engineer with solid knowledge of software architecture, actively participating in large-scale projects, and building a long-term commitment to the company’s success.

projects.title: Backend Developer – Deligo Delivery Platform
responsibilities: Maintained and optimized backend services for the Deligo delivery application.
Developed the shipment fare calculation module, ensuring accuracy and scalability.
Integrated third-party APIs (Global Care) to support shipment insurance and related services.
Maintained and enhanced the authentication flow, adding modern online authentication methods.
Utilized Vietmap and Google Maps APIs to calculate routes, distances, and optimize delivery paths.
Collaborated closely with frontend engineers to build and refine the system administration dashboard.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Docker for seamless deployment across UAT and DEV environments.
Built a notification system for both web (Pusher) and mobile apps (Firebase Cloud Messaging).

projects.title: Laravel Developer – Outsourced OMS & TMS Systems
responsibilities: Contributed to building the core Transportation Management System (TMS) using the service–repository design pattern.
Participated in designing and analyzing key business workflows for OMS/TMS solutions.
Developed core system modules including authentication, warehouse, location, and trip management.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for both API services and the web admin portal.
Maintained and enhanced system functionalities based on evolving customer requirements.
Utilized Redis for system caching to improve performance and scalability.

projects.title: Website selling nutritious seeds
responsibilities: Retain Routing, Request Handling, Middleware, Exception Handling with pure PHP.
Applied DTO and Service-Repository Pattern to the code structure. Created a flexible image upload system with Pipeline Pattern.
Integrated Redis to cache data, automatically update when there is a change.
Developed SPA with jQuery and Ajax for smooth experience.
Optimized database performance by improving SQL Queries and using Indexes.
